text: The Country Doctor is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Country DoctorTHE COUNTRY DOCTOR and stars Kate Bruce, Adele DeGarde, and Gladys Egan. ==Actors== * Kate Bruce as Poor Mother (uncredited) * Adele DeGarde as Poor Mother's Sick Daughter (uncredited) * Gladys Egan as Edith Harcourt â€“ Daughter (uncredited) * Rose King as Maid (uncredited) * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Harcourt (uncredited) * Mary Pickford as Poor Mother's Elder Daughter (uncredited) * Frank Powell as Doctor Harcourt (uncredited) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Country Doctor (1909 movie)
